mapper.select: select * from bi_educational where base_info_id = #{id} order by educational_create_time asc
select * from bi_work where base_info_id = #{id} order by work_create_time asc
select * from bi_job where base_info_id = #{id} order by job_create_time asc
select * from bi_abroad where base_info_id = #{id} order by abroad_create_time asc
mapper.sql: bb.base_info_id,bb.account_id, bb.base_info_type, bb.base_info_name, bb.base_info_sex, bb.base_info_birth_date, bb.base_info_id_number, bb.base_info_nation, bb.base_info_native_place, bb.base_info_political_outlook, bb.base_info_member_time,bb.base_info_education, bb.base_info_degree, bb.base_info_specialty, bb.base_info_positional_titles, bb.base_info_level, bb.base_info_post, bb.base_info_if_doctor_tutor, bb.base_info_if_master_tutor, bb.base_info_start_work_time, bb.base_info_research_direction, bb.base_info_research_expertise, bb.base_info_talent_plan, bb.base_info_honorary_title, bb.base_info_campus_card, bb.base_info_payroll_card, bb.base_info_mentor, bb.base_info_start_time,bb.base_info_end_time, bb.base_info_departure_report, bb.base_info_employment_company, bb.base_info_grade, bb.base_info_contact_information, bb.base_info_honor, bb.base_info_achievement, bb.base_info_nationality, bb.base_info_primary_work_unit, bb.base_info_external_appellation, bb.base_info_engage_start_time, bb.base_info_engage_end_time, bb.base_info_profile, bb.base_info_remarks, bb.base_info_del, bb.base_create_time,a.account_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bi_base_info bb left join common_account a on bb.account_id=a.account_id
and bb.base_info_name is not null and bb.base_info_name!='' and bb.base_info_id not in(select bm.base_info_id from bi_mail_list bm)
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from bi_base_info bb left join common_account a on bb.account_id=a.account_id left join bi_abroad ba on bb.base_info_id=ba.base_info_id
group by bb.base_info_id
order by ${orderByClause}
